name: TH Reviews Bar
author: triopsi

sections.installation:
1. Upload th-reviews-bar to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • FIX “Please fill the Author name field!”-Message

1.0.1

  • Tested up WP 5.7
  • litle php code fixe
  • code formatted

1.0.0

  • First release.
sections.description:
The “TH Reviews Bar” plugin is a very simple way, to show your reviews on your site or blog post. It’s have a responsive design
and is very easys to use it. Create new reviews on the admin panel of wordpress and copy paste the shortcode your post or site.
Or use the TH Reviews Bar Widget for a list of reviews.

Create features

  • Create and manage reviews
  • Add Shortcodes in your post or sites
  • Responsives design
  • Use the Widget to add the complete panel in your site or sidebar.
  • 1-5 star rating

Bugs, technical hints or contribute

Please give me feedback, contribute and file technical bugs on GitHub Repository. Thanks ðŸ™‚

Credits

Developed by Triopsi

  • CC BY 4.0 License – Font Awesome v5.15.2
